review: I met with an accident in July and had three fingers fractured. A surgery was done and K-wire was inserted in 2 of them. I went to Dr Shetty for follow up. He is extremely systematic in his approach and over a period of a month and a half, I am back to using my fingers now. The wires were removed with dexterity and at the correct time, which led to a proper healing. Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very jovial and frank. I met doctor Sharath for getting second opinion on my mom's injury in pelvis. Doctor checked the reports and suggested the options available for the surgery as the bone was dislocated. He explained in detail on the options. He also did the operation successfully.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: In future, if I visit green view hospital for my treatment, consultation or for my family, I will go with this doctor only. Because, the way he explained the issue was really incredible. This kind of doctor is required for the patients, wn I stepped into hospital, I entered with more fear, in fact I was completely uncomfortable, this doctor made comfortable, provided the solution for my problem.  I will sure recommend this doctor for my known sources without fail, next time wn I visit green view hospital, I would like to meet this doctor only.
Doctor was not bothered to ask any questions or be friendly. Felt like he just wanted to rush through the consultation. Would not recommend.

Good experience and well treatment with tablets, back extension exercises. Advised how to take care of ourselves..
Good, concise, helpful. Saw us again with the X-ray during the same appointment. The pain vanished the next morning, without any heavy medication.
Yes...he explained me well about my ailment. Gave some suggestions. He was so kind to explain even though it was lunch time

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: As a professional he is good at identifying the problem *** ****** ****** ***********But I think he should be bit friendly with patients. So that they can ask if they have any queries without hesitation.

My overall experience was good. Dr.Shetty is very good with his work. He is caring and was considerate in explaining about what I should expect from the surgery. I am very satisfied with the doctor and the his skills. However, the other staff and security could have been better, particularly the nursing staff could have been a little more attentive and quick to act over patient requests.

Met a friendly doctor who explains cause of the issue after examination. Doctor Sharath is good at diagnosis and treatment. Must suggest him to my friends. He explained in detail all the options and did the operation successfully. Thank you Doctor! Staff was also good in taking care of us. Overall had a very good experience.

I can simply say it was fantastic. Doctor Sharath described the issue clearly. With a lot of patience, he answered all our queries in detail. I would recommend the doctor to all. Practo’s service was also good. Gave support to us in every way. Thank you!

I went for normal knee pain. I consult for doctor I have pain from last two days then he directly asked for MRI worth 7,600 rs that is too much and even MRI is not available in hospital you need to go 2 KM away from hospital for MRI.  MRI. I'll not commend this doctor. ****** ********* ***** ** ***** **** ** **** **** *** ** ***** *****

Dr Sharath is very patient and humble. He listens to your problems very patiently unlike other doctors who are always in hurry and doesn't even examine properly. He doesn't  prescribe unnecessary medicines or tests. I'm very satisfied with the consultation.

Doctor surgery charges double compare to other doctor in the same hospital. **** ************* ******* ********** ********  ******* ****** *********** * *** **** ** **** **** **** ** ** ***** ******* *** this doctor charged us 16k. So dont recommend doctor.
It was very good consultation and able to help me with resolution for my problem. And easy to communicate problem and he understood it correctly.

review: Went for knee pain. He analyzes the issue properly, identifies the reason and gives the treatment. I  am satisfied with his treatment.
